resources.string: This activity contains playable sounds of each guitar chord.
This activity contains basic information about an app, version, author and release date.
This activity contains playable sounds of each guitar string note E-A-D-G-B-E.
This activity contains a couple of song recordings with tabs which describe how to play them on guitar.
This activity contains player which allows to select an mp3 file located on your mobile in a specific location.
